original_title: The Extraordinary Story of the kid that flew to the sun or Billy the Cool
overview: Billy the Cool is a strange kid that gets disrespected and bullied during his life. He then joins a cult to do a ritual on the sun, in the process building the first ever bicycle that's able to fly to the sun.
tagline: Experience the extraordinary story about the kid who flew to the sun.
title: The Extraordinary Story of the kid that flew to the sun or Billy the Cool
